column2: "Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest Jesus somafo
column3: nye hɛn nua Timoti
column5: "dze krataa yi kɛma enuanom ahotseweefo nye agyedzifo wɔ Kraest mu a wɔwɔ Kolosae: Adom nye asomdwee a ofi hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn hɔ nka hom."

column2: "Daa yɛbɔ mpaa ma hom a
column3: yɛdze ndaase ma Nyankopɔn
column4: hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest n'Egya no
column6: "osiandɛ yɛatse hom gyedzi a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu
column7: nye ɔdɔ a hom dze dɔ ahotseweefo no nyina
column9: "osian enyidado a ɔda hɔ ma hom wɔ sor no; iyi na hom nam asɛmpa no mu nokwasɛm do edzi kan atse."

column2: "Ɔno na aba hom hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔwɔ wiadze nyina so; rosow aba na ɔrodɔɔ so dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ hom so hom mu
column3: ofitsi da a hom tsee na hom hun Nyankopɔn adom no nokwar mu no."

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ hom suaa no wɔ hɛn ewurakowaa dɔfo Epafras a ɔyɛ Kraest no somfo nokwafo wɔ hɛn afamu no nkyɛn
column3: , #Kol 4.12; Fael 23"

column2: "ɔno so na oebeyi hom dɔ a ɔwɔ Sunsum no mu akyerɛ hɛn."
"Iyi ntsi na hɛn so ofitsi da no a yɛtsee no yenngyaa dɛ yɛbɔ mpaa
column3: na yɛserɛ ma hom
column4: dɛ ne pɛ ho nyimdzee nhyɛ hom ma
column5: wɔ sunsum mu nyansa nye ntseasee nyina mu;"

column2: "ama hom aanantsew dɛ ɔfata Ewuradze na ɔsɔ enyi koraa
column3: na hom aasow edwuma pa nyina mu aba
column4: na hom eenyin wɔ Nyankopɔn ho nyimdzee mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze tum nyina aahyɛ hom dzen
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ahoɔdzen a ɔwɔ n'enyimnyam tumdzi no mu no tse
column5: nye penkyɛr nye dɛw nyina mu;"

column2: "ama hom aada Egya no ase
column3: ɔno a ɔama yɛafata dɛ yɛnye ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ kan mu no nya kyɛfa wɔ hɔn egyapadze mu no."

column2: "Ɔno na oyii hɛn fii sum no tum no ase
column3: na oebetsintsim hɛn wɔ no Dɔba no n'ahenman mu;"

column2: "no mu na yeenya ɔpon nye bɔnfakyɛ."
"Ɔnoara na ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn a wonntum nnhu no no ne saso
column3: nye abɔdze nyina farbae;"

column2: "osiandɛ no mu na wɔbɔɔ adze nyina
column3: dza ɔwɔ sor nye dza ɔwɔ asaase do
column9: adze nyina wɔnam no do bɔe

column2: "na ɔnoara na ɔyɛ adze nyina mu kandzifo
column3: na no mu na adze nyina abɔ mu etsim."

column2: "Na ɔno nye nyimpadua a ɔyɛ asɔr no ne tsir: ɔno nye ahyɛse
column3: ewufonyan mu farbae: ma adze nyina mu ɔaayɛ ɔkandzifo

column2: "osiandɛ ɔsɔɔ Nyankopɔn enyi dɛ n'amayɛ nyina ntsena no mu;"
"na ɔnam no do aka ɔnoara ankasa nye ndzɛmba nyina abɔ mu koraa
column3: ɔno nye dɛ
column4: ɔnam ne mbeamudua bɔgyaa no do ayɛ asomdwee
column6: ɔnam no do aka ndzɛmba nyina abɔ mu

column2: "Na hom so a nkyɛ mber a abɛsen no
column3: nna hom yɛ etuatsewfo nye atamfo wɔ hom adwen mu
column6: "afei ɔnam owu do aka ɔno nye hom abɔ mu wɔ no honam nyimpadua no mu
column7: dɛ ɔdze hom besi hɔ dɛ nyimpa krɔnkrɔn a wonndzii dzɛm na asɛm nnyi hom ho wɔ n'enyim;"

column2: "sɛ hom bɛtsena gyedzi no mu
column3: egyina hom fapem do
column5: na wɔanntwe hom emmfi asɛmpa no ho enyidado a hom tsee na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ abɔdze nyina a wɔwɔ wiadze yi mu no
column6: a emi Paul meyɛ ho ɔsomfo no mu dze a."

column2: "Afei midzi dɛw wɔ amandze a muruhu wɔ hom ntsi no mu
column3: na mo so m'afamu mehyɛ Kraest amandzehu a aka no ma wɔ mo honam mu wɔ ne nyimpadua a ɔyɛ n'asɔr no ntsi;"

column2: "ɔno ho na wɔayɛ me ɔsomfo
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ofihwɛ edwuma no tse
column4: dza ɔdze ama me wɔ hom afamu
column5: dɛ mehyɛ Nyankopɔn asɛm no ma."

column2: "Nyew
column3: esumasɛm a ofitsi mbersantsen nye mbasantsen nyina mu osumae no afei dze woebeyi akyerɛ n'ahotseweefo no a"

column2: "Nyankopɔn pɛ dɛ ɔma wohu esumasɛm yi ho enyimnyam ahonya wɔ amanaman mu
column3: a ɔno nye Kraest a ɔwɔ hom mu no ho enyimnyam enyidado no."

column2: "Ɔno na yɛbɔ no dawur
column3: yetu nyimpa nyina fo na yɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn wɔ nyansa nyina mu
column4: dɛ yɛdze obiara bopue dɛ wodzi mu wɔ Kraest mu."

column2: "Ɔno ho so na meyɛ edwuma berɛ
column3: na meper
column4: dɛ mbrɛ n'ahoɔdzen a ɔyɛ mo mu edwuma no tum no tse."
